mapper.insert: insert into ladder(ladderid , usersid , title , addtime ) values(#{ladderid} , #{usersid} , #{title} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update ladder set usersid=#{usersid} , title=#{title} , addtime=#{addtime} where ladderid=#{ladderid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username from ladder a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid order by ladderid desc
select a.* , b.username from ladder a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid and ladderid=#{ladderid} order by ladderid desc

select a.* , b.username from ladder a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid
and a.usersid = #{usersid} order by ladderid asc

select a.* , b.username from ladder a , users b where a.usersid = b.usersid
and b.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and a.title like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{title}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
